text.elemanager.servercommandcastdelay: ServerCommand Cast Delay Multiplier: %s ticks left
text.elemanager.elementstoreall: §4§lAll the %s elements§4§l are stored. Remember to sort your inventory!
text.elemanager.inventoryfull: §c§lInventory is full, causing the module unable be triggered normally, module automatically stopped.
text.elemanager.responsenotreceived: §b§lNo command feedback was received within 4s. Maybe the server is lagging or feedback failed to receive.
text.elemanager.responseignored: §b§lNo command feedback was received within 10s, the feedback has been ignored
text.elemanager.enable: §lAuto store elements §a§lENABLED§r§l，press toggle key§r(%s)§l while sneaking to edit settings
text.elemanager.guide.line1: §r§lUse §6§lscroll§r§l to choose options，press §6§ltoggle key§r(%s)§r§l to switch the state of the option
text.elemanager.guide.line2: For elements, §cStore§r and §aAdjust §rare "Store all" and "Leave 5~10 elements in the inventory" respectively
text.elemanager.guide.line3: For cash items, §cStore§r and §aIgnore §rare just using literal meanings
text.elemanager.guide.line4: §cNormalMode§r is a fixed range of command cooldown; §bLaggingMode§r adjusts the cooldown mainly by the server's TPS
text.elemanager.guide.line5: §r§lPress toggle key§r(%s)§l while sneaking to exit settings
